oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Oath of allegiance for Nancy Jane Coburn Evans
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Oath of allegiance for Nancy Jane Coburn Evans. She was born April 12, 1840, in Hardeman County, Tenn. She died May 24, 1930 in Fayette County, Tenn. She married Simpson Evans on February 28, 1858. He enlisted in Co. A, McGehee's Regiment, Arkansas Cav., CSA, on June 17, 1862. She is buried at Mt. Pleasant Cemetery, Hickory Withe, Fayette County, Tenn.
